component.name: Kindergarten Massaker
component.summary: An alien lands in a kindergarten where the children quickly turn hostile

description.p: A peaceful alien lands in a kindergarten. Kids are coming from everywhere. More and more. They surround the alien, and they want blood! The alien has to avoid kids in order to survive. Everything is seen through a surveillance cam that gets buggier and buggier until it shuts down completely. End of game?
This (non) shooter game is in German, as we all know that aliens only speak German. So, deal with it!
